EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Resource Staffing Request - UPDATE PLEASE READ THIS FIRST (1336508767.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - 110 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Kurt The last step is sending me a copy of your completed I-9. You can find the I-9 form in your enrollment documents; you will sign/date section 1 and a local notary will sign/date section 2 ( there will be instructions on how to complete this form in your enrollment documents as well.) You can send this back to me via email (I dont need a hard copy.) I will also need you to send me a copy of your US passport (you can just take a picture with your phone and email that to me.) Please feel free to reach out to me with any questions. Thanks!Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> Kurt Toth [mailto:kurtjtoth@yahoo.com] Sent: Tuesday, May 08, 2012 3:43 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: Resource Staffing Request - UPDATE PLEASE READ THIS FIRST Sara, What are the next steps and when can we expect the transition to be finalized? Thank you. Kurt On May 7, 2012, at 10:23 AM, Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> wrote:Hi Kurt, Thanks so much!Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. From: Kurt Toth [mailto:kurtjtoth@yahoo.com] <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> Sent: Saturday, May 05, 2012 8:30 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: RE: Resource Staffing Request - UPDATE PLEASE READ THIS FIRST Sara, Per your request, attached is the updated Key Management excel spreadsheet. Please feel free to contact me if you have any questions or concerns. Thank you. Kurt
